name: NOSTALGIA15
author: Arisuki
description:
A
 fairly limited palette perfect for painting charming, rustic 
landscapes, reminiscent of the works of Studio Ghibli. A variety of 
earthy, natural tones are presented in a minimal way that invokes 
childhood memories and nostalgia. This is a modified and condensed 
variation of Haboo's Neapolitan45 but more muted (posted with 
permission!)
